mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_TBL_01(SEQ, WRITER, CONTENT, SUBJECT, PASSWD, REGDATE, IP, READCNT, REF, RE_STEP) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 FROM BOARD_TBL_01), #{writer}, #{content}, #{subject}, #{passwd}, SYSDATE, #{ip}, 0, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REF),0)+1 FROM BOARD_TBL_01),0)
mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM, P.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, K.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD_TBL_01 WHERE RE_STEP = 0
AND SUBJECT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY REF DESC) K WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRow} )P WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow};
